processingCommand.script:
echo ${timesRestarted}

if [ ${timesRestarted} == 0 ]; then
   touch /tmp/der/source/{a..z}.txt
elif [ ${timesRestarted} == 1 ];
then
   touch /tmp/der/source/{A..Z}.txt
elif [ ${timesRestarted} == 2 ];
then
   touch /tmp/der/source/{1..28}.txt
fi


#if [ ! -d "$dir_der" ]; then
#mkdir $dir_der
#fi
